segments.text: Your assistant said that it was time to come in and sign my escrow papers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t be intimidated . There is a lot to sign , but I will explain everything to you very clearly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you need anything from me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All the papers have been drawn up , but I will need to see your picture ID so we can notarize these papers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are a lot of papers !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are going to go through these bit by bit . You will have plenty of time to read the fine print .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My dad is going to be here in a minute to help me go through this with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want you to get any outside help that you need . Do not ever sign documents that you don ’ t understand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I start moving in after I finish signing these documents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When these papers get processed , the house will be yours !
segments.speaker: S2
